description:
In the 22nd century space travel, planet colonization and even anti-gravity basketball are commonplace. Planet Earth has become uninhabitable though, and therefore people live in domed-off colonies on the other planets.
On a school field trip, a human error causes a young transfer student named http://anidb.net/ch13873 [Luna], her pet robot, and six of her classmates to be engulfed by a gravity storm, forcing them to crash land on a seemingly uninhabited Earth-like planet.
There, with Luna as their leader, her robot cat http://anidb.net/ch9559 [Chako], the lone wolf http://anidb.net/ch9560 [Kaoru], the spoiled rich boy http://anidb.net/ch9562 [Howard], the shy http://anidb.net/ch13872 [Sharla], the obedient http://anidb.net/ch13875 [Bell], the prideful musician http://anidb.net/ch9556 [Menori] and the young genius http://anidb.net/ch13874 [Shingo] must fight for their survival. But is the planet really uninhabited, or is there someone or something out there, waiting in the deep shadows of the dense forest?

titles.title: Honmono no Kaze, Honmono no Umi
ほんものの風, ほんものの海
What`s Going To Happen To Us?
私たち, どうなっちゃうの!
シャアラ, 負けちゃダメ!
僕らはゲームをしてるんじゃない
まだ歩き始めたばかり
Ikiru Tame ni Taisetsu na Koto
What`s Important In Order To Live
生きるために大切なこと
We Can Definitely Live Together Amicably
きっと仲良く暮らせる
A Forest Where Anything and Everything is Big
I Really Want To Go Home
僕だって帰りたいんだ
There`s Always A Blue Sky in Your Heart.
Please... Take Care of This Child...
I Don`t Want to Say Goodbye
俺たちはきっとやれる
Although We Don`t Have Enough Materials
Juubun na Zairyou mo Nai no ni
十分な材料もないのに
とても大事な仲間です
どうしてそんなものが
That`s Why I Have To Go
We`ll Return to the Colony Together
一緒にコロニーに帰るんだ
ハワードが助けてくれた
お父さん! お母さん!
あなたはあなたじゃない
Kono mama Da to Kono Hoshi ga...
このままだとこの星が...
Not Going So We Can Die
死ぬために行くんじゃない
